title: Skin Suggestions - Dunkmaster Series
body:
Hey,

I believe that Dunkmaster **Draven**, **Syndra** and **Ziggs** would all be good additions to the Dunkmaster series of skins.

It's lonely being up in top lane and **Dunkmaster Darius** needs some buddies anyway.

I would like your suggestions on if you think Riot should add these skins (just like they did to fill out the Wild Card Twisted Fate series) or they are bad ideas.

Thanks,
- Ultra.

replies.body: What about Alley-oop Malphite and Yasuo, or Zac and Yasuo
zac e going for a dunk

You know who needs a Dunkmaster skin? {{champion:133}}

I mean there's nothing in the rules of Basketball that prohibits the use of birds, right?
I used to main Quinn and I can't see how see would dunk (unless you count in a very well re-textured Sky-Strike...)
She has a 100% strike rate though, never missed a shot.

if they did it well a thresh would work if they would some how work his box into being a net/basket ball hoop or something like that but there isn't many supports that would work with it given abilities 

I know the {{champion:412}}  example would be a long shot if it was to happen but it would be cool 
only cause I main him

> I know the  example would be a long shot if it was to happen but it would be cool
only cause I main him

LOL

>if they did it well a thresh would work if they would some how work his box into being a net/basket ball hoop or something like that but there isn't many supports that would work with it given abilities

Nah, he doesn't 'dunk' per se but I like how Braum has been suggested, his Ult would be amazing and his passive and shield would be amazing.
Needs to be a meta team tho. J4 jungle coz of ult, syndra,ori or ziggs mid coz of round ball objects. Draven and maybe braum

I've actually made a new thread about this, adding a jungler as Vi (she has an undeniably 'dunky' ultimate)
Braum (support) has been suggested as the support because, again, the Ultimate is undeniably 'dunky', same thing with Yasuo (mid).


> Syndra, Orianna or Ziggs mid

Orianna couldn't fill the role, since she can't dunk as well as other champions, if at all.

{{item:3070}}{{champion:61}}

LOL
The Battle Standards would be hoops.
i'm sorry I dont c ziggs dunking ppl
It depends on how you look at it. I'd say OP is referring to Ziggs ult in that respect.
His R and to a degree his Q, if you haven't done a W, Q combo before, you're seriously missing out! {{champion:115}}

but probably not ziggs cause he doesn't have a dunk looking ability it would be better if they made it like a basket ball team or something because a 3pt ziggs would be better suited to the champs abilities or just something along those lines
His ult would be the mega-dunk
Dunkmaster Brand would be awesome though.
